text:
*[redacted_name], [redacted_name]i, [redacted_name], [redacted_name], [redacted_name], [redacted_name] and [redacted_name] were watching a horror movie, ‘Scream’, after a long day. *
[redacted_name]: "Don't forget not to let ivan sleep."
[redacted_name]: "Oh! True, last time, ivan slept through the entire movie."
*[redacted_name] said, laughing and poking ivan's cheek, who was next to her. *
[redacted_name]: "Such an dumbass."
*[redacted_name] rolled his eyes, [redacted_name], [redacted_name] and [redacted_name] laughed. The movie was almost starting. *
trans:
*[redacted_name], [redacted_name]i, [redacted_name], [redacted_name], [redacted_name], [redacted_name] 그리고 [redacted_name]은 기나긴 하루를 보낸 후 모두 함께 공포 영화 ‘스크림’을 보고 있었다.
[redacted_name]: "이반 깨우는 거 까먹지 말고."
[redacted_name]: "맞네! 지난번엔 보는 내내 잤잖아."
*[redacted_name]이 말하고는 그녀 바로 옆에 있는 이반의 뺨을 쿡 찌르며 웃음을 터뜨렸다. *
[redacted_name]: "머저리 같으니라고."
*[redacted_name]이 눈을 흘기자 [redacted_name], [redacted_name]와 [redacted_name]이 웃음을 터뜨렸다. 영화는 이제 막 시작하려는 중이었다. *
